 Way cool, and pretty clear. Moon said both Tesla and Edison were working on machines. There's people out there beating up Chris, but he keeps getting validated! That's why I had to go back to work wiht him. I'm, an old crank, but I won't let ego crap get inthe way---and I trust my intuition. 
 
 There's some that believe life continues on thre other side pretty much as we are here, and "they" are as physical there, and we are here. Not the whisps of energy the paranormal experts would have us believe. 
 
 Frank


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: vfp19968@...: Tue, 13 Nov 2007 03:37:50 -0800Subject: [EVP-ITC] Sound Soap 2 Sweep




Trying a new technique on th computer using editing software called Sound Soap 2. I discovered a way to do a manual forward/reverse sweep of any audio file. Here is an example from last night. The effect is somewhat like EVP maker and exibits some layering."I'm down in Chicago on Tesla's device alive!...Edison, should never meddle"Dave
